bullets.text: Fed extends Fedwire and NSS operating days to Sundays and weekday holidays, enhancing liquidity and settlement continuity for U.S. payments.
Israel and Hamas agree to initial Gaza peace phase enabling hostage and prisoner releases, signaling potential de-escalation.
Former Fed Governor Larry Lindsey withdraws from Fed chair consideration, adding uncertainty to future rate policy direction.
IRS unveils 2026 tax brackets; higher capital gains thresholds and larger standard deductions will shift after-2025 household tax liabilities.
China tightens rare earth controls; related stocks surge as markets price heightened supply risk to global EVs, wind, and defense sectors.
Intel showcases next-gen chips; Arizona fab fully operational, advancing 18A process ambitions and U.S. onshoring of advanced semiconductor manufacturing.
Evidence suggests Chinese firms may be acquiring banned Nvidia chips via intermediaries, challenging U.S. export controls and sustaining China's AI compute access.
Offshore wind giant Orsted to cut 2,000 jobs amid U.S. policy battles and project delays, underscoring sector headwinds.
Paramount explores Warner Bros. deal but financing remains unclear, highlighting ongoing media consolidation pressures and balance-sheet constraints.
Ferrari shares plunge after weak guidance and reduced 2030 EV targets, marking its worst trading day on record.
Delta projects premium cabins will surpass coach revenue in 2026, signaling enduring travel upmarket shift and pricing power.
OpenAI's Sora tops 1 million downloads in under five days, showcasing rapid consumer appetite for generative video tools.
Anthropic shows a few poisoned samples can compromise LLMs of any size, elevating AI supply-chain and model security risks.
JWST identifies a hidden red supergiant shortly before supernova, offering rare insights into stellar death precursors.
Experimental nanotherapy clears amyloid-beta and reverses Alzheimer's symptoms in mice, advancing disease-modifying treatment prospects.
